title: Bug 124067: Relative Path Not Supported When Selecting XML File
description: When selecting an XML file, only absolute paths are supported. Relative paths should also be supported.
OB: When selecting the XML file, only the absolute path is supported. The relative path is not recognized or utilized.
EB: When selecting the XML file, both relative and absolute paths should be supported.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new data source. 
2. Create a new dataset based on an XML file. 
3. Select a file using a relative path.
